channel.title: On the finish line of my own webclient!(need financial help on source)
channel.description:
I got an little thing i dislike on my client: when somebody (non-admin) dies there spawns a npc ("death") in the spot it died i was just wondering how to make it so that it has a timer till it dissapperas or do i have to put it to a auto-restarter so it dissappears every time the server refreshes...?You know, it will be pretty annoying to have about 100 deaths in my PK-Boxes...
Thank you for atleast reading and Über thanks for commenting!
